entry.title: The Convertible Mini Weekender in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 88.00

Description

Introducing the mini to our original Weekender, but better, because this lady has a bottom compartment that zips off completely! Same amount of function packed into a smaller silhouette! A bottom compartment that completely zips off so that this bag can go from Carry-On to Cocktails with just little zip zip zip!
Specifications

Dims: 16"W x 16"H x 8"D
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester
Trim - PU
Strap - Polyester
Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 3.4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Rolled shoulder straps for easy carry, adjustable-removable shoulder/crossbody strap
Wire frame double zip opening/closure, opens wide to see inside
Double zip removable bottom compartment with water resistant lining
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use
External zip pocket for small items

INTERIOR
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure
Large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
Lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
Key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
 
PERFECT FOR
Day Trips
Easy Overnights
Work Days
Gym Stuff
Mom Life
Carry-On

entry.title: The Weekender in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Shopping Totes
Price: 98.00

Description

We designed this bag to take the hassle out of packing for the weekend or whichever days you’re away. Seriously, this tote’s easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Plus, the bottom compartment is designed to keep your shoes, toiletries and travel essentials separate—you can even stash a hair dryer in there. Bonus points: there’s a zipper-pocket on the back that becomes a trolley sleeve so it fits over your luggage handle. Hello, carry-on.

 
Specifications

Dims: 19"W x 10"D x 16"H
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester, Trim - PVC, Strap - Polyester, Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight : 3.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
durable canvas (beige) OR polyester (black) material featuring easy to wipe clean faux patent trim
12" drop partially rolled handle for easy carry
wire frame double zip opening/closure - opens wide to see inside
double zip around bottom compartment with water resistant lining
trolley pass through with zipper - to create pocket when not in use
external zip pocket for small items (keys, phone, boarding pass, passport, sunnies, lip gloss)
embossed BÉIS logo on bottom left
INTERIOR
padded laptop sleeve pocket with velcro strap closure
large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Travel
Luggage Storage
Protecting your luggage

entry.title: The Convertible Weekender
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: the convertible weekender
Price: 98.00

Description

Taking inspiration from our OG weekender, we designed this brand new convertible weekender to take you even further! Features a fully removable bottom compartment that doubles as a packing cube, with a mesh zip-cover. Voila! Now your weekender becomes a compact daytime excursion bag. Wait, not done yet - also includes a removable padded laptop sleeve with exterior pockets, to save you from that awkward moment when you hold up the security line. Easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Hello, versatility!
Shay's Inspo

“The Weekender is one of my favorite bags in the entire world (and not just because it’s a BEIS bag!), so I’m super excited to drop an edition that is not only an amazing new color, but where the bottom is completely detachable - Shay ” 
Details

CONVERTIBLE! BOTTOM COMPARTMENT ZIPS OFF!
For a bag as versatile as you
ADJUSTABLE, REMOVABLE SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry.
WATER-RESISTANT LINING
Keeps what’s inside nice and dry.
ZIP-NOOK FOR SHOES
No more sole-searching.
EXTERNAL POCKET 
Because: keys.
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Fits up to 16” laptop
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.
CARRY-ON COMPLIANT
Bring on the overhead bin.
